com.mongodb

类 ServerAddress

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mongodb.ServerAddress
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable
    直接已知子类:
    DBAddress

    @Immutable
public class ServerAddress
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents the location of a Mongo server - i.e. server name and port number
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格
